title: Levant tabbouleh
ingredients: ['70g fine bulgur wheat', '6 ripe tomatoes, finely chopped', '1/2 onion, minced', '5 bunches flat-leaf parsley, minced', '1/2 bunch fresh mint leaves, minced', '1 bunch spring onions, minced', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '120ml vegetable oil', '180ml freshly squeezed lemon juice', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'cayenne pepper, or to taste']
